Class Window

java.lang.Object
fr.florian.engine.io.Window
public class Window extends Object
The Window class handles the creation, display, and management of a GLFW window. It also manages input events (keyboard, mouse), fullscreen mode, and OpenGL initialization.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Window(int width, int height, String title)
    Creates a new window with the given size and title.

  • Constructor Details

    • Window

      public Window(int width, int height, String title)
      Creates a new window with the given size and title.
      Parameters:
      width - Window width in pixels.
      height - Window height in pixels.
      title - Title shown in the window title bar.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Initializes GLFW, creates the window, and sets up the OpenGL context and callbacks.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the window: handles resizing, clears buffers, polls input events, and updates FPS.

    • swapBuffers

      public void swapBuffers()
      Swaps the front and back buffers, displaying the rendered frame.

    • shouldClose

      public boolean shouldClose()
      Checks whether the window should close.
      Returns:
      true if the user has requested to close the window.

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Destroys the window and releases all resources.

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor(float r, float g, float b)
      Sets the background clear color.
      Parameters:
      r - Red component (0.0–1.0).
      g - Green component (0.0–1.0).
      b - Blue component (0.0–1.0).

    • isFullscreen

      public boolean isFullscreen()
      Returns whether the window is in fullscreen mode.

    • setFullscreen

      public void setFullscreen(boolean isFullscreen)
      Toggles fullscreen mode on or off.
      Parameters:
      isFullscreen - True to enable fullscreen mode.

    • mouseState

      public void mouseState(boolean lock)
      Locks or unlocks the mouse cursor.
      Parameters:
      lock - True to lock the cursor (e.g., for FPS camera mode).

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns:
      The current window width in pixels.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns:
      The current window height in pixels.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Returns:
      The title of the window.

    • getWindow

      public long getWindow()
      Returns the native GLFW window handle.
      Returns:
      The window handle.

    • getProjectionMatrix

      public Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()
      Returns the current projection matrix for 3D rendering.
      Returns:
      The projection matrix.
